name: R00M
description:
As the perfect test subject, you enter the R00M willingly, to defeat the infinite waves of deadly traps and ennemies.

WASD to move,

Mouse to orient camera,

Left click to shoot,

Space or right click to jump

There's a momentum feature : when you jump on a wall, you hang on it, everything is slowed, and you can charge your next jump.

LD 37 Entry
